titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: REVISED INTERNATIONAL STAGING SYSTEM STAGE FOR MULTIPLE MYELOMA - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: Stage l: International Staging System stage l and standard risk Chromosomal Abnormalities (CA) detected by Immunostaining-Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (iFISH) and normal lactate dehydrogenase (LDH)
Stage ll: Not Revised International Staging System for Multiple Myeloma (R-ISS) stage l or lll

Stage lll: International Staging System stage lll and either high risk Chromosomal Abnormalities (CA) detected by Immunostaining-Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (iFISH) or high lactate dehydrogenase (LDH)
